author: GamingBolt
description:
If you're yet to see the gameplay for Crimson Desert, you might not be aware of how solid it's shaping up to be. Its combat is a flurry of attacks, parries, dodges, and some incredible finishing animations that make it look brutal and fraught with peril. 

The world hides a lot of cool things to discover, as well as bringing a plethora of varied activities to the table in order to keep players busy. It looks like it's weaving its story quite well into the moment to moment gameplay, a facet of any open world experience that automatically elevates it over the competition. 

Crimson Desert could be one of the 2026's best titles, and might just be the one that has everything I want in a medieval fantasy title.
title: Why Crimson Desert Is One of My Biggest Games of 2026

author: GamingBolt
description:
2025’s hardest games have been quite humbling despite being very entertaining. But some of them have certainly stood out over the rest, giving us an equal amount of frustration and delight as we overcame the challenges that were placed in our way. 

We present our picks for the hardest games of 2025 that tested both brains and brawn, with something for everybody if you're on the prowl for more video games that do not let anything come to you as easily as their mainstream counterparts. 

Join us and take a look at the ones that had us grinding our teeth even as we grudgingly respected them.
title: 15 Most Punishing Games of 2025 That Make "Normal" Feel Like "Nightmare"
